## DGPs
```{r}
set.seed(7)
### Functions
mu0.x <- function(x) x^3-0.75*x^2+1+0.1*sin(3*pi*x)
mu0.w <- function(w) 0.4*w
tau0.x <- function(x,c) (exp(x)-exp(c))/(1+exp(x))
tau0.w <- function(w,level) {
  if (level==1) out <- sin(3*pi*w) ## 6th degree polynomial on W
  if (level==2) out <- sin(7*pi*w)*(w-0.5)/(5+exp(-2*w)) ## 14th degree polynomial on W
  out <- out-mean(out)
  return(out)
}
mu <- function(x,w,delta,level) {
  mu.x <- mu0.x(x)
  mu.w <- mu0.w(w)
  mu0 <- mu.x + 0.2*mu.x*(mu.w<mean(mu.w)) + mu.w
  mu0/sd(mu0)*delta
}
tau <- function(x,c,w,delta,level) {
  tau.x <- tau0.x(x,c)
  tau.w <- tau0.w(w,level)
  ate + (tau.x + tau.w)/sd(tau.x + tau.w)*delta
}
## Parameters
c <- 0
ate <- 0.2
delta_mu <- 0.5
delta_tau <- c(0.25,1)
level <- 1:2
N <- c(1000)
sig_error <- c(0.1)
for (dm in delta_mu)
{
  for (dt in delta_tau)
  {
    for (lvl in level)
    {
      for (n in N)
      {
        for (sig in sig_error)
        {
          ## Generate data
          x <- 2*rbeta(n,2,4)-0.75
          z <- as.numeric(x>=c)
          w <- runif(n)
          cate <- tau(c,c,w,dt,lvl)
          prog <- mu(x,w,dm,lvl)
          Ey <- mu(x,w,dm,lvl) + tau(x,c,w,dt,lvl)*z
          y <- Ey + rnorm(n,0,sqrt(sig))
          title <- bquote(tau(x==c,w)==.(ate)
                          ~";"~delta[mu]==.(dm)
                          ~";"~delta[tau]==.(dt)
                          ~";"~tau[level]==.(lvl)
                          ~";"~N==.(n)
                          ~";"~sigma^2==.(sig))
          ## Plot data
          par(bty="n",pch=19)
          layout(matrix(c(1,2,1,3,1,4),ncol=3),height=c(1,3,3))
          par(mar=c(2,2,1,1))
          plot.new()
          text(0.5,0.5,title,cex=2,font=2)
          ###
          par(mar=c(5,5,1,1))
          plot(x,y,col=z+1)
          abline(v=c,lty=2)
          ###
          plot(w,Ey,ylab=bquote(mu(x,w)+tau(x,w)*z),col=z+1)
          ###
          plot(w,cate,ylab=bquote(tau(x==c,w)))
        }
      }
    }
  }
}
```
